entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
